title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: ARCHITECTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics, English Language and any two (2) subjects from the following:

Biology,

Fine Art,

Chemistry,

History

English Language,

Geography,

Further Mathematics

Economics/Commerce,

Religious Knowledge,

Technical Drawing,

Business Method.

'O' Level pass in Fine Art or Technical Drawing will be an advantage.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Technical Drawing.

title: ART & DESIGN
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Fine Art Mathematics and any two (2) of the following:

History/Government

Chemistry/Physical Science,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Literature in English,

Clothing and Textiles,

Religious Knowledge,

Economics/Commerce

Geography, Home Economics
subjects: Fine Art and any two (2) of History, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology and a Nigerian Language.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Geography, History, Government, Commerce or Principles of Accounts.

title: BUILDING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and Physics and any three (3) of the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Technical Drawing/Fine Art,

Chemistry,

Geography,

Further Mathematics

Woodwork,

Biology,

Religious Knowledge,

Metal Work,

And at least a credit pass in English Language is Compulsory.  A pass in Art or Technical Drawing will be an advantage.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry or Fine Arts.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology,

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering a pass in Biology is required.

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering a pass in Biology is required.

'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT & VALUATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, a basic science subject and any two (2) from the following:

Geography,

Economics/Commerce,

Physics,

Biology,

Chemistry,

Technical Drawing,

Fine Art,

Woodwork,

Literature,

Metal Work,

Principles of Accounts and Book Keeping

Government
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Arts, Physics, Chemistry, Biology

title: LIBRARY & INFORMATION SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and Mathematics and any three (3) other subjects from:

History,

Literature in English,

Economics/Commerce,

Fine Arts,

Government,

Biology

Physics,

Chemistry

Basic Electricity

Geography,

Typewriting,

Commerce/Principles of Accounting.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science.

title: MARKETING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any one (1) subject from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: MECHATRONICS ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology,

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: MULTIMEDIA TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3)  relevant subjects
subjects: Any four (4) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: OFFICE TECHNOLOGY & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) of the following: Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English, Geography, Office Practice, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Typewriting, Shorthand
subjects:
Any three (3) of: 
1. Mathematics
2. Economics
3. Commerce
4. History/Govt.
5. Geography
6. CRS/IS
7. Principles   of 
     Accounts.

title: PHOTOGRAPHY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two (2) from Geography, Further Mathematics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Visual Art, Economics or Biology/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Any three (3) from the following: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Geography, Technical Drawing, Biology/Agricultural Science, Economics or Further Mathematics.

title: QUANTITY SURVEYING
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and Physics and any three (3) of the following Economics/Commerce, Technical Drawing/Fine Arts, Chemistry, Geography, Further Mathematics Woodwork, Biology, Religious Knowledge, Metal Work, and 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is Compulsory.  'O' Level pass in Art or Technical Drawing is required.
subjects: Any three (3) of Physics, Mathematics, Geography, Economics, Biology/Agricultural Science

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and two (2) of Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,

and two (2) other subjects from Technical Drawing, Metal or Wood Work, Basic Electricity, Geography, Further Mathematics, and Fine Arts.

'O' Level credit pass in each of the three (3) Basic Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and a 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics

title: STATISTICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Basic Science and any three (3) of the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics are compulsory.
subjects:
Any of the three (3): 
1. Economics/  
     Commerce
2. History/Government
3. CRS/IS
4. Mathematics

title: SURVEYING & GEO-INFORMATICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and Physics and any other three (3) subjects from the following:

Further Mathematics,

Chemistry;

Technical Drawing/Fine Art,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

English Language,

Basic Electricity

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry/Agricultural Science, Biology, Economics and Mathematics

title: TAXATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Geography and three (3) other subjects from:

English Language,

Economics/Commerce,

Fine Art/Technical Drawing,

Further Mathematics,

Chemistry,

Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

History/Government

Business Methods/Bookkeeping and Principles of Accounting

 

One of the three (3) subjects must be a basic science subject.  At least a credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Geography and two (2) other subjects from course requirement.

title: WELDING ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
UTME Requirement

Applicants must possess Five(5) Olevel Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and other one from the following relevant Subjects: Metal-work, technical Drawing, Basic Electricity, Eelding Fabrication, Craft pratice and Economics
subjects:
UTME SUBJECT

English Language, Mathematics, physics and Chemistry
